The paragraph mentions two entities related to disease:

1. "hepatocellular pattern of damage" - This is a type of liver damage that affects the liver cells (hepatocytes) and is considered a disease entity.
2. "Cox regression" - This is a statistical method used to analyze the relationship between a dependent variable (outcome) and one or more independent variables (predictors). It is not a disease entity, but rather a statistical tool used to analyze data related to diseases. Therefore, it is not included in the table as a disease entity.
